product_name: Oakley Swim Dawn To Dusk D-Cup Halter Top - Women's
long_description: With wide, comfortable chest band and halter straps, the Oakley Dawn To Dusk D-Cup Halter Top provides plenty of support and style for all your days spent surfing, swimming or lounging on the sand. Stretchy nylon fabric with stretch-polyester lining allows easy movement; removable molded cups add shape. UPF 50+ sun protection. Oakley Dawn To Dusk D-Cup Halter Top ties at neck and features a hook closure at back.
short_description: With wide, comfortable chest band and halter straps, the Oakley Dawn To Dusk D-Cup Halter Top provides plenty of support and style for all your days spent surfing, swimming or lounging on the sand.
